text: Shadows of Forgotten Ancestors is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Parajanov.Умерла актриса из фильма "Тени забытых предков" Татьяна БестаеваТени забытых предков It stars Ivan Mykolaichuk, Larisa Kadochnikova, and Tatyana Bestayeva. ==Actors== *Ivan Mykolaichuk as Ivan *Larisa Kadochnikova as Marichka *Tatyana Bestayeva as Palahna *Spartak Bagashvili as molfar Yurko *Mykola Hrynko as Chief Shepherd *Leonid Yengibarov as Mykola *Nina Alisova as Paliychuk == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Parajanov
title: Shadows of Forgotten Ancestors
